result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose Angel Sevilla

defendant.name: Sevilla, Jose Angel
defendant.address: 1656 South Cesar E Chavez Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53204

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jose Angel Sevilla appeared by video.  Attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt appeared by video for Jose Angel Sevilla.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Defense requests a plea/sentencing date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 30.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Jose Angel Sevilla appeared by video.  Attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt appeared by video for Jose Angel Sevilla.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Defense counsel has not received discovery and an offer from the State. 
State placed offer on the record.
Defense counsel informed the Court that the defendant has pending felony matters that may globally resolve.
Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture. 
Case adjourned to Branch 30. 
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 082322,
Payable Number: 1028626,
Receipt Number: 22RP034605,
Amount: $20.00
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Jose Angel Sevilla in court with attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for pre-trial conference. Defense needs discovery and offer and requests an adjournment. Case adjourned to Br 30.  Status conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jose Angel Sevilla in court with attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt.  Defendant Jose Angel Sevilla in custody.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jose Angel Sevilla appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
